name: Fear Liath
description: The Fear Liath is a Large undead creature with a dark gray shadow form. It manipulates the battlefield and instills fear in its enemies utilizing its Gray Curse ability.
memorable: The Fear Liath creates a dark cycle of death and resurrection, where it can turn its victims into more of itself.
goals: To instill fear and spread its curse among living creatures.
relations: May serve under necromantic entities or dark forces eager to spread fear and terror.
environment: Typically found in dark, ominous locations where fear prevails.
strengths: Resilient against various damage types when incorporeal and immune to common conditions like fear and poison.
weaknesses: Lower hit points and average defense make it vulnerable to strategic attacks.
attacks: Executes a melee slam attack, inflicting bludgeoning damage and potentially blinding opponents.
most_powerful_ability: The Gray Curse ability can result in instant destruction from remove curse and creates endless fear by raising victims as new Fear Liaths.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, enhancing its perception in low-light conditions.
skills: Notable for high stealth +6 and athletics +5, enabling it to move quietly and evade detection.
additional_information: Incorporeal form appears as a dark gray shadow when observed.
Affected opponents must avert their gaze to avoid targeting it directly.
Gains resistance to various damage types while incorporeal.
Vulnerable to strategic attacks due to low hit points.
Possesses a decent melee attack capability.
test_queries: undead creature that curses and blinds
shadowy monster with high stealth and fear abilities
large incorporeal undead lurking in darkness
powerful cursed entity that manipulates foes
